title: How can I report someone who's gonna afk in champion select??
body:
Hi all,
is there a chance that I can report someone who gonna troll?
like this one

PornHub Dot Com : can i top
PornHub Dot Com : afk
Akihabara : ?
Akihabara : y did u do this

replies.body: Doesn't affect you enough to justify a report. He'd get kicked from the game and wait 5 minutes; you'd go on to get a new game with different people.

Well, your best chance is obviously to report them after the game and also if those names are the actual ones then 1. Report them for innapprotaite names and 2. This isn't a place for naming and shaming.

Reporting after game is your best bet if you make it in. Otherwise if you have a screenshot you can [send it to support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with details of what happened.
